attributes.action: Create an Ofgem stile body to regulate petrol prices at the pump for food prices
attributes.additional_details: I'm staggered that both main parties are happy to feed the oil Execs rater than regulate them, fuel prices ate the pump affect direct cost of transporting the goods food for example, if you want to feed the poor bring the cost of transporting the food under an Ofgem stile body to be regulated in the same way that fuel prices for heating your homes are regulated, which one is bigger fuel at the pump or heating fuel, bonuses for top Oil execs or food for the poor.
attributes.background: I would like the Gov to introduce an Ofgem stile body to regulate fuel prices at the pump the main source of food price rises as this is the only way to bring the inflation under control, with the oil barrel below $100 petrol prices should be in the region of £1.35 and not £2, reasonable profit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
